title: Collaborative Pair Programming Competency Development Program for Novice Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic programming concepts and syntax
context.additional_context: Programming problem-solving skill development through peer interaction in digital-device-enabled settings

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 80% collaboration efficiency by clearly defining roles (rotating driver-navigator) during pair programming
Learners identify and propose solutions for three or more logical errors through real-time code reviews with peers
Learners foster a positive collaborative atmosphere by using social support expressions (active feedback, encouragement) five or more times
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
